channel.title: Need help with NPCs wars
channel.description: I want to make a NPC war but I have no idea how make NPCs ignore you so they won't shoot me on sight. So I was wondering if anyone knows the console command for it.

item.title: Need help with NPCs wars
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
Use notarget

You can also use ai_disable to make them stand still and not shoot each other until you finish the npc’s placement.

Read full topic
